website_summaries.verdict: These shoes live up to the Under Armour reputation for durability and comfort.
pros: Durable and made for hard wear
cons: A bit on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Got a size 7. My son is more of a size 6 or 6.5, and this was a solid, good fit. He loves the look of the shoe, and he finds it very comfortable. I think we'll be buying a lot more Under Armour shoes. Probably our best shoe buy yet.
customer_reviews.author: Into the wild

customer_reviews.title: Kids hates wearing these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Initially, we thought our son liked these shoes. After the 1st day of him wearing these, he REFUSES to wear them again after multiple attempts. There's an interior lining underneath the shoe laces that hurts the top of his foot. We loosened his laces three times before I finally gave up! He refuses to wear these without a meltdown. We don't recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanypadolsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker, but could not be worn by my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker, but could not be worn by my son who wears a size 3. I bought him a half size larger (size 3/12) because they were for track and Under Armor sometimes runs small and they were still extremely small. We just got back from an Under Armor store and a 3 1/2 in another style fit perfectly with a size 4 being way too big. Therefore, I would say this sneaker runs much smaller than others and you may need to go up a full size or a size and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Some colors were cheaper than others, so if color isn't too important then you might get them cheaper by selecting a different one. Great looking shoe, my son loves them. I have noticed when he wears them he cant skateboard at all in them, he couldn't skateboard before either so nothing to worry about there.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Nigma

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome looking shoes!! The photo doesn’t give them justice!! I love them!! They are for my grandson!’ He hasn’t seen them yet!! I’m sure he’s going to love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Glinda Yates

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this shoe. It was the correct size, but felt too narrow and 'squishy' as I was informed, when trying it on my son. Not pleased with it at all unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look really cool but the left shoe was way too tight on the top of my son’s foot. He kept saying it was going numb. And I had ordered one size up due to the reviews. So we had to return it, unfortunately. He loved the way they look though.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. the fit my son well and he loves them. I am definitely getting a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Willis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, great fit, excellent quality. My kids chew through Champion and Nike like paper. These UA sneaks hold up to their abuse & look cool through it all.
customer_reviews.author: A Cust

customer_reviews.title: Boys under armour shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for school p.e. shoes they for comfortably and he can run alot more because of the good treading. Quality is great, of course we should expect that from under armour. I would buy these shoes again deffinately.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome. My son loves them. And look more expensive than they actually are
customer_reviews.author: A godi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for active boys
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are cross country runners and they love these shoes. Plus they can also be worn and look great with jeans or shorts or track pants. Great quality and they hold up much longer then Nike’s.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer789

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy good looking. My son claims they make him run faster
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - purchased for my son. We've had these for a couple of weeks, and he loves them. I will update my review after we've had these awhile. Our first pair of U.A.s didn't last very long - the fabric on the toes tore up really quickly. I am more hopeful for these because they have better reinforcement around the toes. These seem to be tougher shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CurtsyLoo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking but kind of
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son and he only had them 2 weeks and the sole was already starting to pull away from the show in the front. Very nice looking but kind of cheap
customer_reviews.author: Skye Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Peels off
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a negative review on under armour products as we ususlly love them. The bottom of these started to peel within 2 days. My son was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J.M201

customer_reviews.title: My mother loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: she already had them in black, but thry were kind of old. so i decided to get her another pair of what she claimed was her favorite shoe. she was happy, tried them on and loved them . instantly her new favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy as always. It fit just as expected and my son loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Bakster

customer_reviews.title: initially they are a great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: We have only had them for a short time, so I am not able to give rates for wear (which is important to me). However, initially they are a great looking shoe, good grip, fits as expected. My boys LOVE them. They ran around in them right away for quite some time to "test them out". They say they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: julierider

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son in third grade bought them one size larger than he usually wears and they fit great would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these...fit comfortably and hold up well 😁
customer_reviews.author: Beth Haun

customer_reviews.title: The shoes looks nice, but they too narrow even for a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looks nice,but they too narrow even for a regular feet, my son have skinny feet and this shoes are quite tie for him.
customer_reviews.author: leonardo f rincon quinchucua

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe very narrow if your going to use tieless laces with the shoe I'd recommend finding a wide Width
customer_reviews.author: Aprilashes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable. My son loves them. Seem to be lasting okay.
customer_reviews.author: Olga A Niese

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Only brand We buy to hold up to our children
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cage

customer_reviews.title: In process of getting next size up. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: In process of getting next size up. They are expensive, but well built and do last. Only brand i buy for my kids..
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes & they look great too
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes & they look great too! So far they are holding up well & my boys are hard on some shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: 4th grader had to have
customer_reviews.text: My son said these are the best shoes he had ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Askari's

customer_reviews.title: Nice but made small
customer_reviews.text: Made small. Need to go up 1.5 sizes compared to Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Shapland

customer_reviews.title: My son wears a 4 I bought the 4.
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a 4 I bought the 4.5 for him and way too small had to go u- to the 5
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Reviews had indicated these tend to run small. I ordered a half size up for my son, and they fit perfectly. He loves them!! Great looking, comfortable shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Nunnally

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great show but rubs a bit small. Could've ordered a size up.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves these shoes he said they are two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Stretzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fit as expected.my son says they are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves theses shoes! They fit as expected, and arrived on time😊
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my kid says they are comfortable and loves how they look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these because of the look and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F

customer_reviews.title: modern and confortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my son and he loved them. The design looks even better in the shoe that what you can see in the picture and they are very confortable. The only thing is that I will buy 0.5 size up since they run a little bit small
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sizing not right. Just lost out on return window. Now I have $70 worth of too small shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Knudtsen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These were are great price, fit well and look cool.
customer_reviews.author: nora s

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small otherwise fine as far as quality. Had to pay for return purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Human

customer_reviews.title: He wanted sneakers like his dad
customer_reviews.text: Actually there for Christmas for my grandson . but I know they will fit him ! He wanted sneakers like his dad !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 9 he picked these out on line and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son just loves Under Armour shoes. These are no different. Fit well and are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security ink theft tag attached to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Shoes unusable due to security ink tag attached to one shoe. Shoes box also arrived taped closed, extremely unusual. Product origination questionable and will not buy from this distributor again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves them, Run small
customer_reviews.text: My son's other shoes are a roomy 6, so I bought a 6.5 US in these after reading that they ran a little small. I should have gone with a 7. These fit perfectly now, so he'll outgrow them before he destroys them. Kid loved them though, and immediately ran off to show them off to the neighbor kids, so I guess we're not returning them for a size up. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Derbin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson did not like the shoe when we received them
customer_reviews.author: Memaw

customer_reviews.title: My son complained shoe fit him too tight and had ...
customer_reviews.text: My son complained shoe fit him too tight and had trouble putting them on. Will return for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: My son won't go back to Saucony
customer_reviews.text: My son was a saucony kid until he slipped his feet into under armour sneakers. This is his third pair and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE Under Armour shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Under Armour a few years ago after being die-hard Nike!! I haven't, and won't be switching back. Under Armour is by far my favorite sneakers! I'm now buying them for both my son & myself!
customer_reviews.author: VixenRose

customer_reviews.title: The size was right but the shoe did not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was right but the shoe did not fit the foot wanted to reorder but size was not in stock.😔
customer_reviews.author: veldernia  thornton

product_meta.title: Under Armour Boy's Micro G Spine Disrupt Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Lace-up closure for a snug fit. Plush tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Charged sockliner molds to your child's foot shape. Two-piece midsole features a cage and core elements for added protection. Full-length Micro G midsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs. Solid rubber outsole over high-impact zones for lasting durability at a lighter weight. Imported.
